mapper.insert: insert into acl (id, description, `name`, url) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, description, `name`, url from acl

select acl.id,acl.description,acl.`name`,acl.url from acl inner join user_role inner join role inner join role_acl on acl.id = role_acl.acl_id and role.id = role_acl.role_id and role.id = user_role.role_id where user_role.user_id=1 group by acl.id
